title: Cellular Systems Performance Engineer
summary: Join the Wireless Technologies and Ecosystems (WTE) organization and be part of a best-in-class team of engineers, working with multi-functional teams to drive innovation and develop products used by millions worldwide.
description: Apple’s Cellular Systems Analysis team is seeking talented, highly motivated and disciplined engineers to work across layers on groundbreaking cellular technologies.
key_qualifications: Hands-on experience in system engineering/system performance analysis role, Deep knowledge of 5G and LTE PHY/MAC/Protocol stack, TCP/IP, Strong knowledge of multi-antenna techniques and procedures such as Massive MIMO, mmWave Beamforming and Beam Acquisition/Management, Good understanding of FR2/mmWave challenges and 5G Standalone protocol, Solid understanding of 3GPP standards, Strong scripting experience (Python preferred, Perl) and excellent debugging skills, SW development and system design experience - great plus, Highly motivated and self-directed, Thrive in a collaborative environment and can clearly communicate while confidently driving multiple projects across many teams, Obsessively passionate and inquisitive, and seek to solve everyday problems in innovative ways, Laser-focused on the smallest details that are meaningful to our customers
education_experience: Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent experience.
